New York University Abu Dhabi Library
Demonstrations in Alexandria - 1921 AD.MC.050
20 Photographic Prints
1921 Twenty photographs on four album pages, annotated in English, documenting the arrival of Saad Zaghloul in Alexandria on the 4th of April 1921 as well as the funerals of those killed by British troops on the 22nd and 23rd May 1921. AD_MC_050
Content Description
Twenty photographs on four album pages, annotated in English, documenting the arrival of Saad Zaghloul in Alexandria on the 4th of April 1921 as well as the funerals of those killed by British troops on the 22nd and 23rd May 1921.
Associations/Societies/Organizations Alexandria, Egypt Saad Zaghloul Democracy Politics Crowds Photographic Prints Gelatin Silver Prints
